name: game-thumbs
description: A simple API that generates and serves various sports' matchup thumbnails and logos.
author: Seth

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development TRUST_PROXY=0 IMAGE_CACHE_HOURS=0 RATE_LIMIT_PER_MINUTE=0 SHOW_TIMESTAMP=false LOG_TO_FILE=true ALLOW_CUSTOM_BADGES=true node index.js
scripts.dev:mma: NODE_ENV=development TRUST_PROXY=0 IMAGE_CACHE_HOURS=0 RATE_LIMIT_PER_MINUTE=0 SHOW_TIMESTAMP=false LOG_TO_FILE=true LEAGUES_ENABLE_MMA=true node index.js
scripts.dev:tennis: NODE_ENV=development TRUST_PROXY=0 IMAGE_CACHE_HOURS=0 RATE_LIMIT_PER_MINUTE=0 SHOW_TIMESTAMP=false LOG_TO_FILE=true LEAGUES_ENABLE_TENNIS=true node index.js
scripts.dev:mma+tennis: NODE_ENV=development TRUST_PROXY=0 IMAGE_CACHE_HOURS=0 RATE_LIMIT_PER_MINUTE=0 SHOW_TIMESTAMP=false LOG_TO_FILE=true LEAGUES_ENABLE_MMA=true LEAGUES_ENABLE_TENNIS=true node index.js
scripts.test: for file in test/*.test.js; do [ -f "$file" ] && node "$file" || exit 1; done
